artist: Artist: Kiki Smith; Printer: Universal Limited Art Editions (ULAE); Publisher: Universal Limited Art Editions (ULAE)
description: from a suite of 12 lithographs--.3-5,.8,.10,.11 and .1,.2,.6,.7,.9,.12 each framed together in two frames; pair of distorted faces joined at noses, center right; two other distorted, elongated faces above and below; two silver knot shapes at left
markings:
Numbered in pencil, LL: 16/51
LLC, publisher\'s blindstamp: ULAE (intertwined)
medium: Lithograph printed in black, with alumnium leaf appliqué on cream Japan paper
provenance: Private collection, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LL: Kiki Smith 1991
title: Banshee Pearls (9)
